title: Head of Partners & Brands - Sofia, Bulgaria
content:
About Glovo
If you‚Äôre here, it‚Äôs because you‚Äôre looking for an exciting ride. 
A ride that will fuel up your ambitions to take on a new challenge and stretch yourself beyond your comfort zone. 
We‚Äôll deliver a non-vanilla culture built on talent, where we work to amplify the impact on millions of people, paving the way forward together. 
 
Not your usual app. We are the fastest-growing multi-category app connecting millions of users with businesses, and couriers, offering on-demand services from more than 170,000 local restaurants, groceries and supermarkets, and high street retail stores. We operate in more than 1500 cities across 25 countries. Every year, +200k merchants generate over 4B‚Ç¨ in sales through our platform and over 20M customers get their goods delivered in minutes.
Together we revolutionize the way people connect with their everyday needs, from delivering essentials to connecting our ecosystem of users through innovative solutions powered by technology. For us, every day is filled with purpose.
What makes our ride unique? 
ü§ù Our culture and strong values. 

We have an ‚Äò‚Äôoffice-first‚Äô‚Äô culture and we place collaboration at the center of everything we do! 
We have a non-vanilla personality and feedback mindset. We don‚Äôt shy away from difficult conversations - we see them as a gift! 
We work with high intensity and have fun along the way.  We also celebrate the wins (a lot!). 
We celebrate diversity in all its forms and foster an inclusive culture where everyone can bring their authentic selves to work. 

üí™Our career development philosophy. 

We are building a talent house of high performing teams and leaders. We invest in people who raise the bar and help others reach their full potential. 
We take ownership of our career development. We don‚Äôt believe in linear and predictable career paths - we create the job of our dreams! 
We embrace opportunities to move the needle and make an impact beyond our scope. 

ü§ùOur commitment to being a force for good. 

Our platform is an important economic tool for millions of people (customers, partners, couriers) and we are taking action to amplify our positive impact. 
We invest in doing good by dedicating time and resources into social and environmental initiatives. 
We have the ambition of being DIB role models across the tech industry. We are creating environments, systems, and processes that provide equal opportunities, break biases, and empower our communities.

We have a vision: To give everyone easy access to anything in their cities. And this is where your ride starts.
 
YOUR MISSION
The way we manage our company is built on the belief that by giving a WOW service to our clients, we will be able to change the delivery market. How are we doing it? By paying attention to all the details. Glovo is a hyperlocal marketplace featuring the trendiest places in each city & delivering their products in less than 60 mins.
This role is for a senior leader (Head of Partners / Commercial Director) of Glovo‚Äôs commercial team, which focuses on working with our core part of the business - restaurants. As a Head of Partners (Commercial Director) in Bulgaria you will have the unique opportunity to help us:

Partners

Improve our selection (sign those final few great restaurants not yet on our platform)
Devise new ways to help our partners grow their business on our platform

Glovo

Help us reach KPIs and position Bulgaria as one of the best performing countries in Glovo
Setup best in class ways of working for all of our commercial teams
Work with your team leads to grow our talent and build a great team culture


We're looking for someone who has a mix of the:

Operational excellence to get great work done
Negotiation and collaboration skills needed to bring out the best from our partners
Strategic, innovative and creative thinking that's required to develop outside the box solutions
Management skills and emotional intelligence required to lead and inspire a team 

 
THE JOURNEY

Devise the long-term commercial strategy for Bulgaria
Oversee directly multiple areas of responsibility: sales, partnerships, monetization, etc.
Analyze business / financial data to take key decisions for commercial in the country
Lead a team of ~15-20 individuals and lead your direct and indirect team to greatness - hire top talents, help them perform, grow and develop as professionals
Drive, structure, analyze and channel daily work and information with local Commercial Managers - setting goals, delegating, and supervising the team‚Äôs performance
Guide the local commercial teams in order to achieve sales and account management targets and maintain good relationships with our partners
Work with a cross-functional team (marketing, operations, finance) to achieve quick & quality execution
Get into details, deep-dive and problem solve. You will make things happen together with your team
Lead project implementation and translate it into actionable tasks to ensure continuous improvement
Establish and maintain relationships with key stakeholders in top restaurants
Give visibility to main stakeholders of status and follow up on next steps
Collaborate with colleagues to learn from each other in a supportive environment that allows you to grow, develop and make a difference

 
WHAT YOU WILL BRING TO THE RIDE
Background 

At least 5 years of relevant experience in managing a high-performer commercial team; working in multiple countries and markets will be a plus
Led negotiations of large-scale contracts and you're comfortable of building relationships with C-level of other organizations

Leadership, Business Acumen and Collaboration 

Team leadership: 5 years of experience in leading and motivating teams to achieve collective goals
Business acumen: Proven track record of understanding and empathizing with clients‚Äô / partners' business models, challenges, and objectives to create strategies and deliver value through collaboration
Stakeholder collaboration:

External: Proven experience of at least 5 years in working with external partners to align on strategic initiatives, foster mutual growth, and ensure seamless collaboration
Internal: You‚Äôre an expert on managing stakeholders, working with peers, and leveraging other teams aspiring to do what‚Äôs best for the company 


Key Skills

Great communication and interpersonal skills. 
Project management skills, highly organized and detail-oriented approach. 
Problem solving skills, data-driven with strong commercial and analytical skills.
Excellent knowledge of Google Suite and/or MS Office, Excel.
Excellent written and spoken Bulgarian & English skills. 

Culture

Ability to work in a high growth and high-performance start-up with a fast pace
Adaptable, positive mindset: possess a flexible attitude towards evolving roles within the commercial domain
We value versatility and the ability to adapt to new challenges while ensuring a stable and consistent job scope
You are always respectful, kind, and fair

Individuals representing diverse profiles, encompassing various genders, ethnicities, and backgrounds, are less likely to apply for this role if they do not possess solid experience in 100% of these areas. Even if it seems you don't meet our musts don't let it stop you, we are all about finding the best talent out there! Skills can be learned, and embracing diversity is invaluable.
We believe driven talent deserves:

üåü An enticing equity plan that lets you own a piece of the action.
üí™ Top-notch private health insurance to keep you at your peak.
üçî Monthly Glovo credit to satisfy your cravings with zero delivery fees on all Glovo orders!
üèñÔ∏èFlexible time off (uncapped vacation days) , the freedom to work from home two days a week, and the opportunity to work from anywhere for up to three weeks a year!
üß† Online therapy and wellbeing benefits to ensure your mental well-being.
üìö An external learning budget to fuel your thirst for knowledge and personal growth.

Here at Glovo, we thrive on diversity, we believe it enhances our teams, products, and culture. We know that the best ideas come from a mashup of brilliant diverse minds. This is why we are committed to providing equal opportunities to talent from all backgrounds - all genders, racial/diverse backgrounds, abilities, ages, sexual orientations and all other unique characteristics that make you YOU. We will encourage you to bring your authentic self to work, fostering an inclusive environment where everyone feels heard. 
Feel free to note your pronouns in your application (e.g., she/her/hers, he/him/his, they/them/theirs, etc).
So, ready to take the wheel and make this the ride of your life? 
Delve into our culture by taking a peek at our Instagram and check out our Linkedin and website!
